body.name: YEECORE Dual Dash Cam, Real 4K+1080P Front and Rear, Built-in WiFi GPS, 3" IPS Screen, HDR Night Vision, 24H Parking Monitor, 157°Wide Angle Dash Camera for Cars, G-Sensor, Loop Recording (H22)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 33 mins
Or fastest pickup Sunday, February 18. Order within 33 mins
features: 【Real 4K + HDR 1080P Yeecore Dual Dash Cam】H22 Dash Cam 4K is Yeecore newest dashcam front and rear camera, the basic version of D22 dash camera, more cost-effective. 4K+1080P high-definition resolution, equipped with a 157° front camera, and a 140° rear camera, provide full protection for your car to keep you out of trouble. The dash camera for cars trucks suv.

【Dash Cam with Speedometer WiFi GPS】The dash cam front and rear wireless has built-in WiFi, use the Yeecoreviewer App (IOS/Android available) to access videos, live view, download videos directly on your phone, and then easily share your travel scenery and exciting moments with your family and friends on social media. The built-in GPS module records your driving route, location, speed, and time and marks it directly into the recording video.

【4 Parking Modes for 24/7 Recording Protection】Upgrade to 4 parking modes, 1.Collision Detection Mode 2.Motion Detection Mode 3.Low Framerate Recording Mode 4.Low Bitrate Recording Mode. Please check the introduction of the 4 parking modes on the product description, you can choose the parking mode according to different parking situations. To use 24 hours parking monitor mode, need a hardwire kit (buy extra ASIN: B0BK8Y9ZXG).

【With Night Vision】The car camera has built-in Sony STARVIS sensors with HDR technology, the front and rear dash cam will automatically balance the bright area and the dark area. It can also shoot clear videos and images at night and in dark environments such as underground parking lots. Rear camera uses exclusive digital IP technology, compared to analog rear cameras on the market, digital cameras have more stable, clearer, and fidelity effects.

【Emergency Lock & Loop Recording】The camera for car recording front and back, when the memory card reaches its storage limit, the car dash camera auto-overwrites the oldest recordings.If the G-sensor detects a sudden collision, it locks and saves the current video. This locked video can serve as evidence and won't be overwritten.

【Extreme Temperature Resistant Super Capacitor】This dash camera has a built-in supercapacitor. Compared with traditional lithium batteries, it can withstand extreme temperatures from -4°F to 158°F, which can prevent black screen, restart, overheating, and other problems. Supercapacitors are more durable and have a longer service life than ordinary lithium batteries.

【Easy Installation & Lifetime After-Sale Service】We offer lifetime technical support, a 30-day refund and 18-months warranty, and FREE firmware update. Provide 24/7 technical support and are committed to providing 100% satisfactory service. If you have a problem, please let us help you deal with it first.
Note: Please format the MicroSD card in the camera before initial use, Support MicroSD card up to 512GB (not included).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Yeecore Dual Dash Cam - Real 4K+1080P / Best Vehicle Dash Cam on the market
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the YEECORE dual dash cam Model# H22, Real 4K+1080P, front and rear, built-in Wi-Fi GPS, 3" IPS screen, HDR night vision, 24H parking monitor, wide angle, and G-sensor loop recording. I can confidently say that it's one of the best dash cams on the market for cars. It has amazing features, including dual recording, super night vision, loop recording, built-in GPS, Wi-Fi app control IOS / Android true WDR, HDR, time lapse, G sensor, 7/24H parking mode, screen saver, H.265 advanced video compression and 512GB max storage capacity.What sets this dash cam apart from other models is its real 4K+1080 UHD resolution. The incredibly super clear images even in low extreme light conditions. In addition to the front camera capturing an ultra wide angle view of the road ahead, the rear camera also provides ultra wide angle coverage. The HDR High Dynamic Range technology ensures that videos are balanced even in the low light or exposure conditions.The YEECORE 4K+1080 Dual Dash Cam also comes with built in Wi -Fi and GPS capabilities. The free proprietary mobile app YeecoreViewer makes it easy to control the dash cam from your phone less cables for a simpler installation process. Additionally, the Loop Recording feature helps reduce memory space by overwriting older recordings when the memory card is full while the G Sensor detects collisions and automatically locks those events to files for safekeeping in case of an accident dispute. The 24HR Parking Mode also ensures that your vehicle is monitored even when parked by turning on and recording any vibrations detected. a cable needs to be purchased and installed in your vehicle for the parking Mode feature to work.This dash cam is great for anyone looking for a reliable yet affordable device that provides excellent quality footage at all times. It can be easily installed within minutes and comes with an 18 month warranty as well as a 30 day return guarantee if you're not satisfied with your purchase.Overall I am really impressed with this product and would definitely recommend it to anyone looking for a reliable dash cam at an affordable price point. It has all the necessary options that make it worth investing in real 4K+1080P UHD resolution plus dual recording night vision capabilities so you can rest assured knowing that your vehicle will always have top notch surveillance while you are on the road.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dash cam, clear video quality
reviews.reviewText: The camera quality was much better than I expected, the videos are really quite clear and good low light performance. It captures lots of information, It’s a solid camera and there are a lot of great features. The features and functionality are easy to learn.YEECORE has a great video Step by Step guide. It will make everything so much easier. Dash cam with WiFi file transfer from my iphone app to save any headaches with file transfer, app works as well so far. All that said, I think it's very good price for this camera.Overall I’m very happy with my purchase and would buy another if I needed to.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Excellent video and easy to useI am impressed with the quality of this dash camera. It has many functions I wanted, night vison, parking mode, Time lapse, GPS with speed, time, address. I hate to pull out the microsd card to download the footage，but this camera can using the app on my phone, it’s easy to find whatever event I need to view and save, easy to provide this to the police or insurance.Setting it up is a breeze: simply plug it into the cigarette lighter, attach it to the windshield, and you're ready to start using it. The only challenge is managing the cables if you want a tidy setup, but overall it is easy to install. If you want to hardwire it into your car, you will need an additional wire. Also the camera mount with the the tape, I feel the stickiness better than suction cup mount.highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good Quality Dash Cam
reviews.reviewText: This is my second dash cam of a different make to install in my other vehicle. I really like the dash cam. It was easy to install. Taking my time to run the cables, install and set up the dash cams took me about an hour. Some others may be faster. Picture quality day and night is fantastic. The camera and app are very user friendly where downloading and using the app is a breeze. The front dash cam swivels and can be moved up or down for viewing preference. The back dash cam is also able to move for viewing preference position. I highly recommend buying a U3 card that is at least 256mb or higher to be able to store more recordings and set your recording loop for 1 minute for faster downloads. The only reason I am not giving 5 stars is because in the video library, it does not have a visible date/time stamp to easily retrieve and view a recording for downloading if needed like my other dash cam does. Definitely an inconvenience if there are multiple recordings in your library and you are trying to find that recording that occurred at the time you are looking for. It would be a huge benefit if the manufacturer can push an update to the system that fixes this date/time stamp issue in the recording library for user friendliness. This is a very good dash cam and if you decide to purchase this one, you will be happy with your choice. I am.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like this camera, it is easy to use and comes with various settings such as displays, screen time out, parking mode, along to the app that makes you view the videos directly on your phone when connected to cam wifi. The video quality is great. The compass and orientation was really needed for my car and glad that the camera comes with a compass. A very smart addition!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Yeecore Dashcam works great!
reviews.reviewText: The Yeecore dash cam system works great! It was very easy to install. The images are super clear. And the fact that it GPS’s and you can see that information on the playback is amazing. I love the fact that I can date stamp my license plate number right into the image. Easy to access the videos. I’m thoroughly impressed with this product especially for the price. Five star product all the way!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Very Poor Camera
reviews.reviewText: Made in Korea with very poor English instructions. The camera picture was terrible, brown and blue not real colors. App never synched to camera properly. Don't waste your time with this camera.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid price point
reviews.reviewText: Dash cam is as advertised. Very easy to install and set up, crystal clear video on front and back cameras. Very user friendly.
